name: United Students Academy
description:
United Students Academy or USA is a dating simulator/visual novel where you date US politicians and uncover Principle Trump's secret plans. In this visual novel you play as Jackson Warbuck a new student at USA. Jackson will over time make friends with the various politicians at USA and with the help of his new friends save USA from certain doom.

The demo of the game consists of Jackson's first day at United Students Academy. USA will be fully released sometime in July.

Obama

Barack Obama is one of the datable characters in USA. His best friend is Bill Clinton and he is in Legal Language 101.

Ryan

Paul Ryan another one of the datable characters in USA.  His best friend was Mitt Romney but that will soon change and Mitt begins to hang out more with John F Kennedy.

Kennedy

John F Kennedy another one of the datable characters in USA. He is the most popular kid in USA. He is well known for his pranks throughout the school. He avoids trouble do to his father being on the School Board.
